about.title: About me

0.title: (Work-Study) Full-Stack Developer - Holis
0.content: Holis is a company that builds a SaaS software allowing brands and suppliers to measure, improve and communicate their products environmental and social impact.

1.title: Student @Epitech
1.content: Epitech is a private higher education institution in computer science. Using project-based learning, the school teaches its students autonomy, work organization, and the ability to adapt to any professional context.

about.content: I'm a software engineer with a passion for building existing systems from scratch, and I'm also a chess-programming enthusiast. I just love creating chess programs of all kinds, from simple GUIs to complex engines. I started programming out of curiosity and I've been doing it for 5 years now. I'm always looking for new challenges and I'm eager to learn new technologies.

blog.title: Blog
blog.content: I write about chess, programming and web development. I also write about my experiences and thoughts on various topics.
